Description: Job Title: Dermatologist ConsultantJob Location: Saudi Arabia - AldawdamiJob Type: Full-timeJob Description:We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced dermatologist Consultant to join our team. The dermatologist will be responsible for diagnosing and treating a wide range of skin conditions, including acne, eczema, psoriasis, and skin cancer. They will also be responsible for performing cosmetic procedures, such as Botox injections, chemical peels, and laser treatments.Responsibilities:• Diagnose and treat skin conditions using a variety of methods, including medication, surgery, and laser therapy• Provide cosmetic treatments, such as Botox injections, chemical peels, and laser treatments•Consult with patients to discuss their concerns and develop treatment plans• Keep accurate and detailed patient records• Collaborate with other medical professionals to provide comprehensive care• Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in dermatology by attending conferences and continuing education courses• Provide education and support to patients on how to manage their skin conditions• Adhere to all professional and ethical standards set forth by the medical industrySkills
Skills: • A medical degree from an accredited university
• A valid medical license to practice in Saudi Arabia
• A minimum of 5 years of experience in dermatology
• The position requires the candidate to be a Consultant or Deputy Consultant Dermatologist
• Ability to work both independently and as part of a team
• Strong attention to detail and organizational skills• Friendly demeanor with a positive attitude
• Flexibility to work in two locations
